item.title: The 10 Best Heist Plans In Movies, Ranked
item.description: Many of the best heist movies feature intelligent plans carried out by a team of master thieves, rather than using violence and cheap action.

item.title: "Bid Our Fake Marriage Adieu": The Conjuring 4's Vera Farmiga Emotionally Reflects On Patrick Wilson Partnership As Filming Nears An End
item.description: Vera Farmiga shares a heartfelt tribute to her onscreen husband Patrick Wilson as they prepare to wrap production on The Conjuring: Last Rites.

item.title: Every Confirmed Cast Member In Avengers: Doomsday (So Far)
item.description: Avengers: Doomsday looms closer and the confirmed cast members set to star in the next MCU team-up movie are steadily emerging as weeks progress.
